result.execSummary:
The defendant Riley Joseph Dahms was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Riley Joseph Dahms

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Riley Joseph Dahms
Current: 232 Freiburger Ave, Antigo, WI 54409 United States  (Effective: 12-04-2015)
Prior: 620 Omega Circle, Antigo, WI 54409

Defendant Riley Joseph Dahms in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls  @ 2:37 pm.   New complaint filed. State gives agreement file new complaint, Poss of THC, 100 fine plus costs.  Def. agrees.  off the record @ 2:41 pm.  back on the record @ 2:41 pm.  Def. does not object to have Judge Stenz handle case. Def. advised of ATTY rights. Def. waives atty rights & would like to proceed today. Court finds waiver is freely & voluntarily given. State gives plea agreement from 13CF130. Ct 1 Poss of THC, no contest plea.  off the record @ 2:48 pm.  back on the record @ 2:57 pm.  Plea questionnaire & waiver of rights filed. Def. advised of constitutional rights & J.T. Court finds plea is freely & voluntarily given, accepts plea & finds def. Guilty to Poss of THC, in ct 1. State gives statement. Def. has nothing to say.  Court orders Fine of $100 fine plus costs. Def. given 30 days to pay if fail to pay will order commitment.  Def. advised of postconviction rights. ( (Per Judge Stenz balance of bond from 13CF130 applied to 15CM265 & balance to be returned to poster.)
